Reviews.Title: I've spent $20 bucks on worse.
Reviews.Author: Derek
Reviews.Content: Nothing fancy here but Everything seems to work.  From what I paid and what I got, I'd call it a square deal.

Reviews.Title: Just needed a charger
Reviews.Author: wfedf
Reviews.Content: I love this kit. It comes with a small little stand, two batteries, a wall charger, a car charger, and even more for under $20. All that I needed was a wall charger but I got more than I needed for such a great price! (Fujifilm FinePix Z20fd)

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: I needed a second battery for my camera, and this package gave me two batteries, a charger and assorted accessories for a great price.  It arrived promptly and was exactly as advertised.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this mainly for the batteries, my Fuji finepix JX250 needed a new battery, this fit the bill perfectly.
